A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was on the edge of my seat\, I laughed\, I cried. I received some answers and I love that some mysteries still remain --- it is a trilogy after all. I was bittersweet to see Leia alive\, one last time and after not having much (nothing) to say in TFA\, Luke killed it in TLJ. I will go and see it again\, to see all the things I missed the first time.
